name: Radio Man
description:
Radio Man is an interactive fiction about a world destroyed by a global pandemic in the form of a mental disease (confusing, I know, just play the game). A man spends the rest of his life inside a bunker, hidden from the surface world, his only connection with it is through a set of old radio equipment.
